meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unendurable.
meanings.sent1: The unendurableness of the loud noise made it impossible to concentrate.
meanings.sent2: The unendurableness of the pain forced him to seek medical help.
meanings.sent3: The unendurableness of the situation was so extreme that it almost seemed comical.
meanings.sent4: The unendurableness of the heat was like standing in an oven.
meanings.sent5: The unendurableness of the smell was so intense that it lingered for days.

meanings.definition: The inability to be endured or tolerated.
meanings.sent1: Her unendurableness towards spicy food made dining out a challenge.
meanings.sent2: The unendurableness of his boss's constant criticism led to his resignation.
meanings.sent3: The unendurableness of the cat's meowing at night was both annoying and amusing.
meanings.sent4: The unendurableness of the traffic was like being stuck in a never-ending maze.
meanings.sent5: The unendurableness of the cold made her shiver uncontrollably.
